alfredsnippet.snippet:
"The greatest challenge facing mankind is the challenge of distinguishing reality from fantasy, truth from propaganda. Perceiving the truth has always been a challenge to mankind, but in the information age (or as I think of it, the disinformation age) it takes on a special urgency and importance."

- "Environmentalism as Religion," A lecture by Michael Crichton, Commonwealth Club, San Francisco, CA, September 15, 2003
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Greatest Challenge Facing Mankind is that of Distinguishing Reality from Fantasy
